pullRequest.title: Set return-client-request-id
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR updates the builder in azure-search to set return-client-request-id instead of x-ms-return-client-request-id.

commit.message: Updated client builders to set return-client-request-id instead of the x-ms-* variant
Update test to pass in playback

nodes.bodyText: @alzimmermsft In the next month or so, we'll be deploying a service update that will set both client-request-id and x-ms-client-request-id on the response if either return-client-request-id or x-ms-return-client-request-id is specified.
